createEnumeration.description: Units of measurement for recipe ingredients

createComponent.description: An ingredient with quantity and unit for a recipe
Individual step in a recipe with instructions and timing
Equipment or tool needed for a specific recipe step
Reference to ingredients used in a specific step

createModel.description: A cooking recipe with ingredients, steps, and metadata
Recipe author or chef with bio and profile information
Recipe category for organization and filtering
Base ingredient that can be used in recipes
User review and rating for a recipe

createComponentField.description: Equipment and tools needed for this step

createSimpleField.description: Additional notes about using this equipment
Alternative ingredients that can be used
Estimated time for this step in minutes
Additional notes about this ingredient in this step
When to add this ingredient in the step (e.g., 'at the beginning', 'after 5 minutes')
Why this ingredient is special or tips for using it
Name of the person leaving the review
Alternative tools that can be used instead
How to prepare the ingredient for this step (e.g., 'diced', 'melted', 'at room temperature')
Whether this equipment is essential or optional
Name of the equipment or tool
Name of the ingredient (references main ingredient list)
Order of this step in the recipe
Icon name or emoji for the tip
